english.segment1: Another sleepless night. I'm turning in my bed. Long before the red sun rises
english.segment2: In these early hours. I'm falling again. Into the river of my worries
english.segment3: When the river runs away. I find a shelter in your name
english.segment4: Jesus, only light on the shore. Only hope in the storm. Jesus, let me fly to your side. There I would hide, Jesus
english.segment5: Hear my anxious prayer. The beating of my heart. The pulse and the measure of my unbelief. Speak your words to me. Before I come apart. Help me believe in what I cannot see. Before the river runs away. I will call upon your name
english.segment6: Jesus, only light on the shore. Only hope in the storm. Jesus, let me fly to your side. There I would hide, Jesus
